description: This file defines an Angular service class 'NotesService' that provides methods for performing CRUD operations on 'Note' objects via REST API endpoints. It uses Angular's dependency injection and HttpClient for HTTP requests.

classes.name: NotesService
classes.description: Angular service for handling CRUD operations on notes via REST API.

methods.name: listNotes
methods.description: Returns an Observable emitting all notes.

methods.name: getNote
methods.description: Returns an Observable emitting a single note identified by ID.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with the provided payload.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note by ID with the provided payload.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID, returning an Observable indicating success.
